website_summaries.verdict: This rain-like showerhead filters out impurities for a fresh clean.
pros: Silicone nozzles are easy to clean
Installation is quick and requires no tools
The head can be adjusted thanks to swivel ball technology
cons: Some customers with very heavy filtering needs say it does not remove all impurities

customer_reviews.title: It leaks if you don't take it apart and apply plumber's tape to all threads.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't filter as well as other shower heads designed for the same purpose. This particular shower head is so poorly designed, you have to completely disassemble it, use plumbers tape on any threaded surfaces, and re-assemble. If you don't, it leaks. A lot. This review is as certified as the filter, whatever that means. It'll stay in my shower until I find a replacement, which I can't seem to find fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: robk64

customer_reviews.title: No more residue
customer_reviews.text: The water feels cleaner and it doesn't leave a residue on the shower or on your skin. My only gripe is that you cannot adjust the water jet pressure. That said, I love the way my skin feels after I shower; it doesn't have that slick feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Scarolina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shower Head For Healthy Happy Showers
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this shower head because I was intrigued and impressed that it included a filter. I was sold when I found out this shower head is safer and healthier for your hair and skin. As an added incentive, I am constantly on the go and felt that investing in my shower/bathroom would be necessary to relax after work, gym, and running around all day. The water is soft and it's rain-like features is very soothing. It surprisingly makes such a big difference and is the perfect way to unwind. Now I know what I'll be getting everyone for Christmas this year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Design and Good Water Pressure
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful elegant design, and flawless functionality. My boyfriend got first use after a quick and easy install, and said: "the water feels so soft, it's like a warm blanket covering my body". I have bad water pressure in my home, and this shower head is not affected by that in the least. There is a good amount of pressure and good surface area covered by the spray. I was originally searching for a shower head that could function as a water purifier, which is how I came across this particular shower head. The water feels nice, but I have no idea whether it Is working as a purifier... I suppose I should buy a testing kit of some kind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brondell The VivaSpring Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: We ordered Brondell The VivaSpring shower head. After reading the benefit of filter that Brondell use technology to reduce contaminants we are so happy using it. And also filter inhibits the growth of scale, algae, fungi, and bacteria. The quality is great, we feel like a rain shower. We also like the its simple design.
customer_reviews.author: Mitul S.

customer_reviews.title: Prevented Breakouts
customer_reviews.text: This thing changed my d**n life. I moved into a brand new set of apartments in September and suddenly started breaking out on my neck, chest, and back where I never had before. After ruling out stress, certain foods or allergies, I realized it might be the water supply and bought this filtrated shower head. Literal overnight difference. I stopped breaking out the very next morning. This thing is a lifesaver and installation took maybe 5 minutes. Couldn't recommend this more.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Rueger

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product . Good quality , easy to install , designer look , simple and efficient. No issues and defenitly a great buy , if you care about your skin . You will feel the difference after few min of using it . Water pressure is very good and filters are working on par . Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelian

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan of Filtered Shower Heads.. ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Filtered Shower Heads... I have sensitive skin and I cannot imagine not having a shower head that does not pull chemicals out of water. I purchase this designed after reading the reviews. I've got it for my shower remodel. Looking forwarded to seeing if it is true what others have said about it.
customer_reviews.author: Web Cat

customer_reviews.title: Holy shower power!
customer_reviews.text: Removed the water saver, and it's fabulous! Used one month and only complaint is that now my college age kids shower longer, because it has such great pressure! Skin is less tight and hair rinses cleanly, so much better than our hard, heavily chlorinated city water.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: easy to install but front gray piece with the holes ...
customer_reviews.text: how do i exchange this item? easy to install but front gray piece with the holes in it is slightly distorted and leaks maybe 20% of the water. this part screws on too but the distortion prohibits tightening to stop leaking.
customer_reviews.author: johnm

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the opportunity to use yet as I received late yesterday and had already showered before it's arrival. I will like to say that the installation is very easy, and it looks nicer than I anticipated for its price. The instruction are very straightforward and easy to follow. I am just happy to have a filtered shower head now. My hair and skin will benefit the most from this upgrade! I primarily purchased this because i live in an apartment building and my color treated hair was not reacting well to the water supply. Hopefully this will help.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This filter does not do what they promote. I tested the fiter after 2 days. I used a tds meter to test it. My bathroom sink, my kitchen sink and the water from my yard had the same levels with my filter. There wasnt a difference. I realized it too on my hair that i was still getting a film based and gunky feeling due to the water. Would i recommend this? No. There has to be better products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Rose#1

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! I’ve waited awhile before reviewing cause I wanted to be sure that it does what it’s supposed to do. Having waited about 1 month I have seen changes in my skin/scalp, my scalp used to be so dry it would bleed, but it doesn’t even get itchy any more! The product was very simple to install, and works wonderfully! I am extremely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Jaiman

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this product. The installation took five minutes including taking it out of the package! Very simple. I like the fact that the filter is in the shower head itself, and doesn't push the head down losing headspace like other filters do. (My husband is tall and needs a high shower head). I'm using it for myself and to fill the bathtub for my kids. There is no water flow restriction whatsoever, and the shower head is very nice. I am happy I finally know my kids and I will be protected from chlorine and lead that I know is in our water!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin and hair? Do yourself a favor!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for just over a week now and it’s safe to say I’ve fallen in love! My hair is the softest and shiniest it’s ever been in my life, and my normally dry scalp and skin are feeling better every day. I regularly get itchy red splotches on my face, neck, and chest after showering in spite of trying dozens of soaps, shampoos, and water temperatures, and those have all but disappeared as well. If you’re looking for an inexpensive filtering shower head this is the perfect option!
customer_reviews.author: Ryann Sawin

customer_reviews.title: This filtered Shower Head is Amazing, Just tried it Out for the first time ...
customer_reviews.text: This filtered Shower Head is Amazing, Just tried it Out for the first time and I finally understand what Soft Water Means, It felt Glorious in that Shower, Like showering in fresh spring bottled water, you can feel the difference right away and even smell the difference in the water, smells so fresh and clean and springy, Feels Awesome, I would have been in there for hours if I hadnt had the temp on so hot, My skin feels epic!
customer_reviews.author: LadyLuna1

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it for a few months now and it’s been working flawlessly. It has great water pressure and the deposit that would build up on my old shower head is nowhere to be found on the new one thanks to the filter. It also is very attractive and modern looking. For the price you can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.author: willfrederick

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Pressure
customer_reviews.text: Love this filtration shower head. You can't even see the filter behind the shower head (my last one was bulky and ugly), and the water pressure is amazing! I have not done a water test to determine the actual levels of chlorine removed, but after one use, I could tell a difference in my hair - it was softer, not as frizzy and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug75757

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: We have really terrible water at our apartment and this has changed everything for the better! My hair feels so nice and clean and the rain effect is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Cook

customer_reviews.title: Yes, please
customer_reviews.text: Great product. 2 days later, hair and skin already feel softer. Wish the packaging was more enviromentally friendly. We threw away a pile of plastic. Not needed, just ship it to me in a small box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T HELP AT ALL. DON'T WASTE TYPE MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't help at ALL. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! I have very hard water and it’s destroying my hair. I just bought a brand new water softener and that’s not really helping very much. Someone told me to buy one of these showerheads and it helps a lot. I can’t even lather my hair so it is not helping At ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks higher end for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to install and the water pressure is strong which is often not as good with filtered shower heads (pro tip take out the pressure reducing ring before you install). The head itself is bigger than I expected and is between and normal shower head size and a larger rain shower style. Personally I love that about it but others may prefer a smaller diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Immediate improvement in water quality!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this review because I wanted to give it a chance. I love this showerhead! It installed very easily, and I can already tell a difference with my water. No more constant cleaning to get rid of soap scum! And I like how the filter goes into the showerhead and makes the whole thing look more streamlined.
customer_reviews.author: kestrel

customer_reviews.title: It met my expectations and was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Product looks as it is shown on the pictures. It was so easy to install. Instructions were very clear. The water feels different but I haven't tested it with a water test kit to confirm that chlorine levels were reduced. Will do that later and comeback to update my review. So far I am very happy with my purchase. Product is well designed, built with good metal and plastic materials, I am very inclined to buy their countertop water filtration system in the near future. Like I said so far I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: Moyobuys

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Falls apart after a few months. A leak spring between the black face plate and silver housing so now when I turn on my shower half the water sprays out towards the wall. Can’t believe how poorly constructed this must be to only last a few months and fall apart just from the water pressure/normal daily use.
customer_reviews.author: JakeReviews

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head, nice clean feeling
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a very old shower head at my place, and it is a huge improvement. The water pressure is even and it just feels more relaxing. The filter is easy to install and seals in tight without any tools or extra effort needed. I have another shower that was just installed and I plan on getting another one of these for that one.
customer_reviews.author: Sinusoid

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shower head, but the pressure was just too low for me compared to my Kohler. I'm returning the item. I suspect having a filter in it makes it pretty much impossible to have real strong pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Z. J.

customer_reviews.title: I probably should have expected this, but the water ...
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have expected this, but the water flow is very low. I'm buying an extension arm so I can at least stand right under the showerhead. I'm assuming the filter is doing what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: KarenLeePA

customer_reviews.title: Dandruff eliminator
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have eliminated the excessive amount of dandruff I have had my entire life. Its life changing. No more buying anti-dandruff shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Filtering is extremely ineffective
customer_reviews.text: The filter lasted a month before calcium deposits started building up on the nozzles.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I only wish I would have purchased it much earlier!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: silky hair , softer skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the great reviews I read about it. My daughter has a curly hair, and I noticed a huge difference to her hair and skin right after installing this shower head. Installation is so easy . No leaks whatsoever , it looks nice, and water flow is still really good. replacement filters are fairly priced , and replacing the filter is so east. I loved this product so much and I ended buying another one for the other bathroom
customer_reviews.author: EBTISAM ALHUNAIDI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size & pressure
customer_reviews.text: Just installed mine today and it works great. I like the fact that the head is so big it covers majority of your body. The pressure is good too and my husband approves because he likes the flow to be somewhat strong. I bought this because our water was very hard and was making my skin itchy and dry. I don’t have enough $ to invest in a water softener so I found out shower filters were a good alternative. I will do an updated review on how it works for my skin within the next couple months. Will define buying one more for my other bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Does what it promises.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, can tell the difference. Water pressure is lower though, which I dont mind. It's more like a waterfall shower fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shower head
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shower head. Can definitely tell a difference in skin and hair.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Hard water continues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping that the water quality would improve and takeaway the build-up that we have in our hair. The hard water continues and this didn't help our problem.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of water odor
customer_reviews.text: I love my new shower head! I no longer have an odor from the water and the water seems softer.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, I can see the difference in water color and smell with and without this.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Okay results, expected better
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting better results in its spray/stream but because it has a filter, it makes up for the average performance.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Hair stylist approved
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. It works great and was super easy to install and it was a fraction of the price compared to the website. I have recommended it to all of my clients to use for their hair and skin .
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Designed well
customer_reviews.text: Unique idea to filter the water. Like the simple design. "Chrome Finish" does not mean it is chrome. The outer surface is plastic with a chrome finish. I would have liked real metal with a chrome finish, as it would have more of a possibility of lasting longer. Time will tell if the plastic chrome finish holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN C. GILLE

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious Shower
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shower head with a wide spray. I did not want something with multiple spray options because I never use them. I came upon the VivaSpring Filtered Shower Head. What sold me was the accompanying video from Brondell and the reasonable price. It was perfect from Day 1. The spray is thick and soothing. I feel like I'm in a spa!
customer_reviews.author: mwonacott

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head and filter
customer_reviews.text: Shower head and filter work great my work my wife just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lon Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Works well.  Can Feel a difference in my skin in the first week.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works. Have noticed my skin is less dry. Sent it to my family members.
customer_reviews.author: NilsV

customer_reviews.title: Furthermore quite nice.
customer_reviews.text: I do not know if the filter will last long or not but it makes your skin really softer and it reduced the water consumption. Furthermore quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wally

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant shower.
customer_reviews.text: This shower is easy to install and is very pleasing to stand under, while saturating your skin in filtered water. It is very reasonably priced. And got here quickly.
customer_reviews.author: BettyBoop

customer_reviews.title: just the filter needs to be replace pretty quicky. don't replace it 6 months
customer_reviews.text: the water gets significant softer. just the filter needs to be replace pretty quicky. don't replace it 6 months. you better replace it 3 months. otherwise the jet gonna jam.
customer_reviews.author: Core_Q

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: i have this with the aquabliss filter as well so its double filtered. Feels extra refreshing after each shower
customer_reviews.author: M. W.

customer_reviews.title: What a great shower head
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a great shower head. Very stylish. More importantly, it really filters my water. I have a hyrbid city water / well water system where I live (joys of living on a lake :), so the water has a higher level of chlorine and calcium. Within the first week of installing the Vivaspring in one bathroom I could tell the water was fresher. Fresher to the scent and how the water felt on my body. I even rotated between 2 showers in my home to test the difference. No denying the Vivaspring Shower Head makes a HUGE difference! Buying 2 more for my other bathrooms!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Muldoon

customer_reviews.title: Does want to proclaims
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid construction and design pretty pleased with the performance as well
customer_reviews.author: Lee Vick

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it doesn’t even look like it’s a shower filter because it’s all intergrated in the shower head itself
customer_reviews.author: Mmoreno

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower with VivaSpring
customer_reviews.text: One of the best showers I have had in a long time. The shower head had a nice strong spray which resulted in shorter showers. I am noticing my skin is less dry with the integrated water filter in the shower head. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Randy G

customer_reviews.title: love the built in filter design
customer_reviews.text: love the built in filter design, saves water as well, highly recommend this product. no more chlorine smell in the water.
customer_reviews.author: scott cooper

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Super easy installation. I removed the flow regulation in mine, and it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Doc Allen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic style
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this shower head to filter my hard water deposits. The shower head is bigger than you'd think it would be, as mentioned in previous reviews, but I find it to be the perfect stream and coverage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, easy installation, love having filter to improve water quality and good coverage with shower head.
customer_reviews.author: MBW

customer_reviews.title: Near life changing shower
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install, great flow, lovely large shower head. Makes you not want your shower to end.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and great looking product. Effective too, I feel less scalp irritation than I did before installing this shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Salerno

customer_reviews.title: Really great product....
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a significant difference in the feel of my water on my skin and hair. My building is a little older so the water is hard. Great purchase.....
customer_reviews.author: Vau've Davis

customer_reviews.title: Should Have Bought Sooner
customer_reviews.text: this is terrific for crummy LA water, just wish I'd purchased earlier. helps with better skin as well as hair.
customer_reviews.author: EL VEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install and set up. Perfect pressure and just wide enough !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This shower head was easy to install. It took my husband a few minutes. It has good pressure and my hair and skin are already thanking me!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Adamski

customer_reviews.title: Build an ark
customer_reviews.text: Great I left the water saver out and this thing puts down more water than god trying to destroy the earth.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Best shower head ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Removed flow restrictor for a spa like chlorine free shower! I only wish I hadn’t waited so long to get this!
customer_reviews.author: SFH RN

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: This showerhead has a great water spread and the filter really helps soften the city water. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Miles F.

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and great water pressure. Huge upgrade over our previous shower head
customer_reviews.author: MBoland

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I feel my skin and hair in better condition now.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B.

customer_reviews.title: ... flow-restrictor out but I didn't and my shower was horrible! The slowest water pressure in the world
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had taken the flow-restrictor out but I didn't and my shower was horrible! The slowest water pressure in the world! Then we took it down and found it and took it out. Now it's the best shower in the world! I had a filtered one before this one but it didn't make my hair and skin this soft. I love it, get it, it has all metal attachments so it won't break easily.
customer_reviews.author: V. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: This is an outstanding Filtered Shower Head!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Brondell Filtered Shower Head! The shower head itself is very sleek and nice looking. More importantly, I love that my water is being filtered and safe for my family! My hair and skin seems much softer and I love knowing the long term benefits are contributing to healthy bodies for my whole family. Thank you for making a great product quality-wise but also very good looking!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Benthin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: water pressure is low but good coverage. I am assuming from the filter
customer_reviews.author: Becky

product_meta.title: VivaSpring Filtered Shower Head FSH25-CG | Chrome Finish with Slate face and Wide Rain Spray | for softer skin and hair | 6 month filter FF-15 | Certified Filtration
product_meta.description: Color:SlateThe VivaSpring shower head uses patented technology to reduce the contaminants free chlorine, lead, mercury, and copper. As a bonus, the filter also inhibits the growth of scale, algae, fungi, and bacteria. Surround yourself with a soothing rain spray that restores your skin and hair to their natural look and feel and protects your body from the harmful effects of certain contaminants in your water.
feature_bullets: YOUR STYLE, FILTERED: certified filtration delivers a healthier shower experience in pure style
FEEL THE DIFFERENCE: wide soothing rain spray filters free chlorine, odor, and scale for smoother skin and silkier hair
PREMIUM PARTS: easy-clean silicone nozzles, all metal ½” thread connection and ball joint for easy installation, angle adjustment, and durability
PATENTED TECHNOLOGY: includes FF-15 filter for 10, 000 gallons or 6 months of filtration, certified to NSF/ANSI standard 177 and EPA Water Sense 2gpm
EASY INSTALLATION: VivaSpring showerhead installs easily on any standard ½” threaded shower arm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars152 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
